body.transcript:
Hello! Welcome to Harmony Music School. My name is Bruce Morgan. How can I assist you today?

Hi Bruce! I'm so excited to be here. My name is Joan Torres, and I'm looking to enroll in piano lessons.

It's nice to meet you, Joan! I'm thrilled to hear about your interest in piano. Could I have your contact number to keep you updated with class schedules?

Of course! My number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

Thank you, Joan. And may I know your email address for sending over the enrollment details and other communications?

Sure thing, Bruce. It's joantorres at email dot com.

Great! I've got all your details. We have lessons for all skill levels starting next week. Are there any specific days or times you prefer?

I'm available on Mondays and Wednesdays, preferably in the afternoons.

Perfect, let me arrange that for you. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

No, that's all for now. Thank you so much, Bruce!

You're welcome, Joan! Thank you for choosing Harmony Music School. We look forward to having you with us. Have a great day!
